attributes.action: Stop the misogynistic censoring of females on Facebook and instagram
attributes.additional_details: It is affecting female businesses being run when accounts are removed or ad accounts are blocked
attributes.background: Facebook and Instagram are constantly censoring non-explicit female content. As part of the equalities act this must be challenged. There is often no legal or moral reason for this censorship.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for social media companies to decide.
